title: How to Make Kashmiri Dooney Chutney

steps.headline: Select some walnuts, remove their hard shells and wash them with water.
Add them into a small bowl.
Boil some water in a kettle.
Add the boiled water into the bowl containing the walnuts.
Soak them for one hour or so.
Take a blender and add soaked pieces of walnuts.
Blend them together to form a paste by adding water to it.
Add salt and cumin seeds to it.
Blend them to get a fine paste.
Serve it with Kebabs or fritters.

text: Select some walnuts, remove their hard shells and wash them with water.  Add them into a small bowl.  Boil some water in a kettle.  Add the boiled water into the bowl containing the walnuts.  Soak them for one hour or so.  Take a blender and add soaked pieces of walnuts.  Add green chilies to it.  Blend them together to form a paste by adding water to it.  Add salt and cumin seeds to it.  Blend them to get a fine paste.  Pour it into a bowl.  Serve it with Kebabs or fritters.
